title: Coinbase Executives Meet With SEC To Discuss Ethereum ETF, Argue ETH Spot Market Shows Resilience to Fraud
description:
Coinbase executives are meeting with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to support the approval of a spot market Ethereum (ETH) exchange-traded fund (ETF). A new memorandum reveals that Coinbase executives met with the SEC earlier this week to sway the regulatory agency into greenlighting crypto asset manager Grayscaleâ€™s application for an Ethereum ETF […]

The post Coinbase Executives Meet With SEC To Discuss Ethereum ETF, Argue ETH Spot Market Shows Resilience to Fraud appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
